entity.midnight.rift: ミッドナイトの裂け目
config_cat.midnight.general.tooltip: All the options that can only be set on the server.
config_cat.midnight.client.tooltip: All the options that can be modified by players on server.
config.midnight.midnight_dimension_id.to: The ID to be used for the Midnight Dimension.
config.midnight.rift_shaders.tooltip: If true, rifts will be rendered with custom shaders for standard effects. If false, a simpler (motionless) texture will be rendered.
config.midnight.bladeshroom_damage_chanc: The chance to take a small amount of damage when picking a bladeshroom cap as a percentage. If 0, this is disabled.
config.midnight.can_respawn_in_midnight: Allow players to respawn in Midnight
If true, players will respawn in Midnight after dying in the dimension.
config.midnight.hide_vignette_effect.too: Hides the vignette effect in the darker areas of Midnight.
config.midnight.allow_lightning_damage.t: Allows the lightning in Midnight to burn blocks and do damage to entities.
config.midnight.rift_spawn_rarity.toolti: The rarity that a rift appears. Larger numbers increase rarity. If 0, rifts don't spawn.
config.midnight.rifter_spawn_rarity.tool: The rarity that rifts spawn rifters. Larger numbers increase rarity. If 0, rifters don't spawn.
config.midnight.max_rifter_by_rift.toolt: The maximum amount of rifters that spawn from a rift.
config.midnight.allow_rifter_teleport.to: Allows rifters to teleport to players when they aren't being looked at.
config.midnight.monster_spawn_rate.toolt: Spawn rate of entities of the 'monster' type in midnight (eg. Rifter, Hunter).
config.midnight.rifter_capture_tamed_ani: Allows rifters to capture tamed entities and drag them into rifts.
config.midnight.capturable_entities.tool: Mobs on this whitelist can be captured by rifters, players and animals are already captured by default. Format is mod id:name of creature, just use the modid to whitelist everything from it.
config.midnight.not_capturable_animals.t: Mobs on this blacklist cannot be captured by rifters. Format is mod id:name of creature, just use the mod id to blacklist everything from it.
config.midnight.foreign_flowers_from_bon: Allows the flowers of others mods to appear with bonemeal in Midnight.
status.midnight.rift_nearby: You may not rest now, there is an evil presence nearby
death.midnight.bladeshroom: %sはヤイバタケに貫かれて死んだ
death.midnight.rockshroom_spore: %sはイワタケの胞子が直撃した
advancement.midnight.title: ザ・ミッドナイト
advancement.inebriated.title: 人を酔わせる
advancement.inebriated.desc: スアヴィスの木を破壊する
advancement.shroomikens.title: キノコ手裏剣
advancement.shroomikens.desc: ヤイバタケの傘を投げる
advancement.fungi_forest.title: ライトアップ
advancement.fungi_forest.desc: キノコの森を見つける
advancement.snapped_by_snapper.title: 仕返し
advancement.snapped_by_snapper.desc: 偽りのフナダイを食べようとして噛みつかれる
advancement.your_highness.title: ユアハイネス
advancement.your_highness.desc: 全色のヨルジカに頭を下げられる
advancement.thrown_geode.title: Cracked Up
advancement.thrown_geode.desc: 晶洞石を何か硬いものに投げつけて壊して開ける
advancement.surface_biomes.title: ナイトウォーカー
advancement.surface_biomes.desc: ミッドナイトの全ての地上バイオームと地下バイオームを横断する
advancement.violeaf.title: 薬草レメディー
advancement.violeaf.desc: バイオリーフの中を歩くことで吐き気の症状を直す
